sections.title: Number of class of insurance businesses

fields.infoText: How many different class of insurance businesses do you want to tell us about?

fields.label: Different classes of insurance
fields.infoText:
**Number Description**

1 Accident

2 Sickness

3 Land vehicles

4 Railway rolling stock

5 Aircraft

6 Ships

7 Goods in transit

8 Fire and natural forces

9 Damage to property

10 Motor vehicle liability

11 Aircraft liability

12 Liability of ships

13 General liability

14 Credit

15 Suretyship 

16 Miscellaneous financial loss

17 Legal expenses

18 Assistance

Insurance classes - Contracts of long term insurance (Part II of Schedule 1 to the RAO)

**Number Description**

I      Life and annuity

II     Marriage and birth

III    Linked long term

IV   Permanent health

V    Tontines

VI   Capital redemption

VII  Contracts

VIII Pension fund management

X    Collective insurance, social insurance
See Section 5 of the notice 'Insurance Premium Tax' which will help you to answer the question above.

fields.label: Enter the expected value of your taxable premium income for the 12 month period commencing from the date that you expect to receive your taxable premium
fields.helpText: If you do not have completely accurate figures, enter an estimate instead.

fields.label: Are you registered for VAT in the UK?
Enter your VAT registration number here
fields.helpText: Enter GB followed by the 9 numerical digits

fields.label: Enter your preferred method of payment here
fields.helpText: You can find the different payment methods on the HM Revenue and Customs website enter ‘How to pay Insurance Premium Tax’ within the search facility

fields.errorMessage: First name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.errorMessage: Last name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Status
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary
fields.errorMessage: Position in the company can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
